prompt_base: photograph of a realistic human male or female, sharp focus, detailed skin texture, natural anatomy, intense neutral expression
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k uhd, cinematic volumetric lighting, film grain, subsurface scattering, professional studio portrait
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, illustration, CGI, plastic texture, smooth skin, doll, toy, flat lighting, bad anatomy, deformed, blurry
